description: Main Flutter application entry point defining the app widget and homepage with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen showing a loading message.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the Scaffold with app bar and loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, calls runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp, returns MaterialApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState, returns Scaffold with app bar and body.
